message:
In this video, Brandon Keepers from github is discussing how one can use git/github as their database. Sure one's local filesystem or github is not designed for that, but I like how he highlighted that one should learn to abuse his tools and imagine how he can make them work better for him.

http://eg.okfn.org/2014/01/git-as-your-nosql-database/
name: Git as your NoSQL Database | Open Knowledge Foundation Egypt
caption: eg.okfn.org
